snippet: Calls for more diverse advertising agencies have become common at the conference, but many at this week’s edition reiterated that not enough had been done to bring women into the industry’s work force.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column notes that Advertising Week in New York City has once again featured several panels on how to make industry more diverse, but that suspicions persist that issue is not a real priority for executives; describes three panels examining the dearth of women in creative roles.
lead_paragraph: Calls for more diverse advertising agencies have become common at the conference, but many at this week’s edition reiterated that not enough had been done to bring women into the industry’s work force.

headline.main: At Ad Week, a Push to Make Diversity a Reality Beyond Conference Discussions
headline.print_headline: At Ad Week, a Push to Make Diversity a Reality Beyond Conference Discussions
